thread.title: GOT costume party for New Hope
thread.title_full: GOT costume party for New Hope

author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: GOT costume party for New Hope
text:
GOT costume party for New Hope Oct 20, 2015 Source: HBO Michele Clapton has won an Emmy for her “Game of Thrones” costume design. 
Camden — Green with Envy Salon + Spa will host a “Game of Thrones” costume party Saturday night, Oct. 24, at the Smokestack Grill, 43 Mechanic St., to benefit New Hope For Women. 
The 21-and-older event will feature live music by local band Two Dollar Pistol beginning at 9 p.m., raffles, prizes for best costumes and free appetizers until 10 p.m. 
Cost is $25, $40 per couple, which includes drink ticket(s). All proceeds from the event will be donated to New Hope For Women in support of the fight to end domestic violence.
